DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study determine whether TD-9855 effective treating patient fibromyalgia .
DOC.criteria: • American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) Diagnostic Criteria Fibromyalgia ( FM ) Informed consent 18 65 year age Discontinue therapy adrenergicacting drug , certain medication Only acetaminophen NSAID rescue pain medication No narcotic pain med benzodiazepines Only nonbenzodiazepines rescue hypnotic Any current psychiatric disorder , lifetime bipolar disorder , severe comorbid Axis II disorder , mental retardation , etc , assess Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) Major depression screen MINI unable wash MDD med ( investigator provider 's judgment ) Risk suicide ( investigator opinion and/or CSSRS ) Recent history substance alcohol abuse BMI < 18 ≥45 Concurrent disease ; pain diagnose illness FM ; noncompliance ; history seizure ; pheochromocytoma ; glaucoma ; CV disease ; orthostatic hypotension orthostatic tachycardia ; untreated sleep apnea Abnormal lab value ( liver , kidney , thyroid , others )
